about_the_game:
This is the demo for Planet Explorers, it's about 2-3 hours of gameplay for the storymode.

The build mode is also completely open to players, you can try out our Creations editor where you can create vehicles, weapons, armor, and more.

If you like the demo, please buy our game!
detailed_description:
This is the demo for Planet Explorers, it's about 2-3 hours of gameplay for the storymode.

The build mode is also completely open to players, you can try out our Creations editor where you can create vehicles, weapons, armor, and more.

If you like the demo, please buy our game!
legal_notice: Planet Explorers © 2014-16 Pathea Games. All rights reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernal 3.2
  • Processor: i3+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460+ HD 5770+
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must have OpenCL compatible CPU or GPU (DX10.1)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Kernal 3.2+
  • Processor: i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760+ HD7000+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must have OpenCL compatible CPU or GPU (DX10.1)

name: Planet Explorers Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7 64bit
  • Processor: i3+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460+ HD 5770+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must have OpenCL compatible CPU or GPU (DX10.1)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7 + 64bit
  • Processor: i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760+ HD7000+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must have OpenCL compatible CPU or GPU (DX10.1)

supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
